text: "Throw Your Arms Around Me" is a 1984 song by Australian rock band Hunters & Collectors. It was taken from their fourth studio album Human Frailty. The song was re-recorded and released as a single in 1986. That version went to number 34 in Australia and number 28 in New Zealand. It was one of their best and most popular Australian singles ever released. ==Track listing== All tracks written by John Archer, Geoffrey Crosby, Douglas Falconer, Jack Howard, Robert Miles, Mark Seymour and Michael Waters, according to APRA. # "Throw Your Arms Around Me" - 3:29 # "Unbeliever" - 5:19 ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Hunters & Collectors songs Category:Crowded House songs Category:Pearl Jam songs
title: Throw Your Arms Around Me
